description: Main entry point for a Vue.js frontend application setting up the app instance, registering plugins (Pinia for state management, router for navigation), and mounting the app to a DOM element.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Registers plugins (Pinia, router) with the Vue application instance.

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue application to the DOM element with id 'app'.
